name: MEC Fast Track Shoulder Bag - Unisex
description: For the gym, the overhead compartment, or the 9-5. This duffle style bag features hidden backpack style shoulder straps and a padded backpanel for long cross-airport treks. Packing is quick and easy thanks to the curved panel zipped opening, while a range of internal pockets and compartments provide a wide range of packing possibilities.600-denier Kodra fabric with a polyurethane coating is super strong and survives rigorous  stuffing.Pack body is padded with lightweight foam.Pack straps attach to D-rings and can be separated and stowed in the zippered pocket.Height adjustable sternum strap for backpack mode.Locking zipper heads for main compartment.Separately accessed bottom pocket expands into main compartment, lays flat when not in use, and is ideal for shoes..Flat mesh pocket on underside of lid is easy to access and padded for tablets and other electronics.
